dhp44:1: imaṃ → komaṃ (mr) | vicessati → vijessati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp49:2: vaṇṇagandhamaheṭhayaṃ → vaṇṇagandhaṃ aheṭhayaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ (cck); vaṇṇavantaṃ aheṭhayaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); vaṇṇagandhamapoṭhayaṃ (mr)
dhp52:4: hoti kubbato → pakubbato (bj); sukubbato (sya-all, km); sakubbato (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp56:2: yāyaṃ tagaracandanī → yvāyaṃ tagaracandanī (sya-all); yvāyaṃ tagaracandanaṃ (csp1ed)
